Question.Subject: Why did my internet turn slow when the internet connection icon showed up?
Question.Content: My internet just turned slow yesterday when my Internet Connection Icon showed up and said "Internet is connected" or something like that. I have no viruses and I have over 80% of free space on my computer. Please tell me why its doing this and how to get it back to normal. Thanks for your help.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
If your PC is running slow and you want to make it faster, I recommend you to check your pc heath online first, then you can know why it is slow and fix easily..
Recommended website: http://registry-checking.com/Slow_PC

Answer.Content:
